metadata.title: Home-X Unisex Dickey-Fake Turtleneck Half Top Mock Blouse Dickey Collar-Neck Warmer-White
features: STYLISH: Our mock turtleneck dickey will spruce up your closet, adding class and sophistication to your wardrobe. Finally, you can look elegant and refined without having to layer up. You won’t have to deal with bulky layers anymore! Instead, wear this stylish dickey. It creates the illusion of wearing a turtleneck underneath your clothes.

VERSATILE: The great thing about this dickey is its incredible versatility. It can be worn with a variety of different outfits. Pair it with a v-neck, sweater, pullover, blazer, or jacket. It will add just the right touch. This dickey insert is one-size-fits-all and features a unisex design, so both men and women can wear it.

WEAR ANYWHERE: This dickey can be worn anywhere! Use it to spruce up your business clothes or office attire. It’ll make you look like quite the professional. You can also wear it at a soiree or party for extra class and charm. Or, you can use it for everyday, casual wear. No matter where you wear this dickey, you’ll look great!

EASY TO WASH: This unisex mock turtle neck is perfect for those people who hate doing laundry. It is incredibly easy to wash. Because it’s conveniently machine washable, you can just toss it in the washer and be on your way! You can also quickly hand wash it and throw it in the dryer if you are pressed for time.

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMFY: You won’t even realize you’re wearing this mock turtleneck dickey! That’s how lightweight and comfortable it is. It’s made from incredibly soft fabric, so it won’t make your skin feel itchy like traditional turtlenecks do. Beauty doesn’t have to be a pain when you use this dickey!
description: Dickies are a great way to spice up an outfit! They truly up the ante on otherwise boring and frumpy clothing by adding shape and definition without the bulky mass of an entire shirt. Wear this mock turtleneck below a sweater or shirt to keep your neck warm without needing a scarf. This high-quality dickey is comfortable, lightweight, and easy to use. It’s the perfect piece to complement your wardrobe and is an especially useful accessory during the fall and winter months. It can be worn with a variety of tops. Use it for blazers, v-necks, sweaters, jackets, and other shirts. Instantly, it’ll make you look leaner. This cute turtleneck dickey cover also eliminates the need for layering your clothes. You won’t have to worry about wearing thick layers to make a good impression! Instead, this dickey collar creates the illusion of layering. You can wear it just about anywhere. It’s great for the office, giving you a neat and crisp professional appearance. You can also wear it to a fancy party or formal soiree. Take this with you when you travel to save space in your luggage. Your friends and peers will admire your good taste and impeccable style when you wear this classic dickey. However you wear it, you’re sure to look great! This dickey is made from cotton knit, which is a conveniently durable material. You’ll be able to enjoy it for years to come. Additionally, it’s machine washable! When you need to wash it, just toss it in the washer, and you’re all set! It’s time to update your wardrobe! Add this mock turtleneck dickey to your fashion accessories by ordering it today!
